content: about the pattern this pattern is designed for an easy skill level the instruction portion of the pattern is 6 pages long the pattern includes close-up photos to demonstrate techniques and a full-length video tutorial here s an excerpt of the pattern writing style single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 19 chain 1 turn 20 single_crochet finished size approximately 28 in 71 cm x 23 in 58 cm stitches used chain - chain increase - increase repeat - repeat single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st - stitch supplies used hook *us size m/n 13 9mm hook yarn big twist plush size 6 super bulky weight 100% polyester 153 yds/ 140m per 300g 1 roll in white col a sunflower col b sage col c & coral col d * optional stitch marker *large sewing needle *rug mat optional *small sewing needle & thread *stitch markers snaps or velcro
